          Obtain letter on current face of Cube
 int getValue()
          Obtain value of letter on face of Cube Value = 1 for all vowels Value = 1 for for L, N, R, S, and T Value = 2 for D and G Value = 3 for B, C, M, and P Value = 4 for F, H, V, W, and Y Value = 5 for K Value = 8 for J and X Value = 10 for Q and Z

Constructor Detail

Cube

public Cube(String faceValues)
Constructor to create new Cube with a given letter on each face. Face 0 shows initially. All letters are converted to uppercase

Parameters:
faceValues - six letters on cube
Method Detail

getFace

public char getFace()
Obtain letter on current face of Cube

Returns:
letter on face

getValue

public int getValue()
Obtain value of letter on face of Cube Value = 1 for all vowels Value = 1 for for L, N, R, S, and T Value = 2 for D and G Value = 3 for B, C, M, and P Value = 4 for F, H, V, W, and Y Value = 5 for K Value = 8 for J and X Value = 10 for Q and Z

Returns:
value of letter on Cube face

roll

public void roll()
Roll Cube to obtain a new face
